title: Summer Monteys Fullam, 24, keeps it low-key as she returns home following holiday
text:
She recently hit out at claims she 'used' her ex-boyfriend Paul Hollywood for fame.

Yet Summer Monteys Fullam appeared worlds away from the drama as she put on a smiley display after touching down in London on Friday afternoon.

The 24-year-old barmaid, who dated the GBBO judge, 53, for two years, kept a low-profile in a black hooded jacket which she teamed with skinny jeans.

Glam: Summer Monteys Fullam appeared worlds away from the drama as she put on a smiley display after touching down in London on Friday afternoon

Summer added to her casual vibe with a pair of charcoal trainers and a black New York Yankees baseball cap, while toting a leather Louis Vuitton bag on her shoulder.

She wore her strawberry blonde locks in a naturally wavy style, while adding light touches of make-up to her pretty visage.

Summer was pictured strolling through the terminal while wheeling her suitcase, before trying to find her taxi outside the airport.

Beaming: The 24-year-old barmaid, who dated the GBBO judge, 53, for two years, kept a low-profile in a black hooded jacket which she teamed with skinny jeans

Low-key: Summer added to her casual vibe with a pair of charcoal trainers and a black New York Yankees baseball cap, while toting a leather Louis Vuitton bag on her shoulder

What a beauty: She wore her strawberry blonde locks in a naturally wavy style, while adding light touches of make-up to her pretty visage

Her arrival back in the UK comes shortly after she claimed that the assumption she was with Paul for fame 'couldn't be further from the truth', while admitting she is still healing from their bitter break-up two months ago.

'People think I've used this relationship to be successful, when people see a younger girl with an older guy or vice versa, they think that person is using the wealthier partner- but that's far from the truth,' Summer told New Magazine.

The qualified horse whisperer said it was 'easy to judge her' because she didn't have the 'wealth, fame and high profile' like Paul and that people forget there was 'love, commitment, care and respect' between them.

Beaming: Summer was pictured strolling through the terminal while wheeling her suitcase, before trying to find her taxi outside the airport

Healing process: Her arrival back in the UK comes shortly after she claimed that the assumption she was with Paul for fame 'couldn't be further from the truth', while admitting she is still healing from their bitter break-up two months ago

The pair separated in a high-profile break-up in August, after she dumped him for asking her to sign a non-disclosure agreement.

But Summer admitted she is still healing from the relationship and doesn't want to jump into anything just yet.

'Anyone who's come out of a big relationship doesn't necessarily want to get into another one straight away, I've just come out a very serious relationship and I'm not ready to replace that,' she said.

Not true! 'People think I've used this relationship to be successful, when people see a younger girl with an older guy or vice versa, they think that person is using the wealthier partner- but that's far from the truth,' Summer told New Magazine

No judgement: The qualified horse whisperer said it was 'easy to judge her' because she didn't have the 'wealth, fame and high profile' like Paul

Summer continued: 'It's a healing process... I'm not ruling it out but at the moment I'm getting over a huge break-up.'

Talking further about her high-profile romance, Summer said people 'assume you're not very nice' as she firmly shut down claims she dated Paul for his money.

And while Summer isn't ready to move on, she claimed earlier this month that Paul moved onto another woman several years his junior when he began seeing pub manager Melissa Spalding, 36.

Paul became close to Melissa after he spent a lot of time in her pub, the Chequers in the Kent village of Smarden, after Summer dumped him.

He had met Summer while arranging a birthday party for his estranged wife Alexandra two years ago.

Split: Summer and Paul separated in a high-profile break-up in August, after she dumped him for asking her to sign a non-disclosure agreement
description: The 24-year-old barmaid, who dated the GBBO judge, 53, for two years, kept a low-profile in a black hooded jacket which she teamed with skinny jeans.
